div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ChargeItem|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `ChargeItem` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `ChargeItem`. Element `ChargeItem` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem`.
FHIR R5 Resource `ChargeItem` is representable via FHIR DSTU2 Resource `Basic`. Element `ChargeItem` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.
Element `ChargeItem.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem.meta`.
Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta`, use that element instead. Element `ChargeItem.meta` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.
Element `ChargeItem.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem.implicitRules`.
Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules`, use that element instead. Element `ChargeItem.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.
Element `ChargeItem.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem.language`.
Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language`, use that element instead. Element `ChargeItem.language` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.
Element `ChargeItem.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem.text`.
Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text`, use that element instead. Element `ChargeItem.text` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.
Element `ChargeItem.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem.contained`.
Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained`, use that element instead. Element `ChargeItem.contained` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.
Element `ChargeItem.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem.identifier`.
Element matches Basic element path `Basic.identifier`, use that element instead. Element `ChargeItem.identifier` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.
Element `ChargeItem.definitionUri` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem.definitionUri`.
Element `ChargeItem.definitionUri` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `ChargeItem.definition`.
Element `ChargeItem.definitionUri` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.
Element `ChargeItem.definitionCanonical` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem.definitionCanonical`.
Element `ChargeItem.definitionCanonical` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `ChargeItem`, but has no target element specified.
Element `ChargeItem.definitionCanonical` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.
Element `ChargeItem.status` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem.status`.
Element `ChargeItem.status` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.

Element `ChargeItem.encounter` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ChargeItem.context`.
Element `ChargeItem.encounter` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `ChargeItem` is not mapped.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
